title: Okta - Login - Authorized User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has access to Diamond Cloud
custom_steps: WHEN a user logins to the Diamond Okta endpoint
custom_expected: THEN the user can access Diamond Cloud

title: Okta - Login - Unauthorized User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user does not have access to Diamond Cloud
custom_steps: WHEN a user logins to the Diamond Okta endpoint
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a User is not assigned to the client application. message.

title: Okta - Single Sign On
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has access to Diamond Cloud
AND has logged into the Okta Portal
AND sees the Diamond App
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to the Okta
custom_expected:
THEN the user should have a valid session
AND then will not have to login to Diamond Cloud

title: Okta - Close Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has access to Diamond Cloud
AND the user has logged inot
custom_steps:
WHEN a user closes the browser tab
AND then in a new tab navigates to the Okta portal
AND then in a new tab navigates to Diamond Okta login
custom_expected:
THEN the user will have a valid session
AND the will not need to login again

title: Okta - Logout
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has access to Diamond Cloud
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks on Logout
custom_expected:
Then the user should be logged out
AND then redirected back to the login

title: Okta - Logout (Portal)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has access to Diamond Cloud
AND the Okta portal
custom_steps:
WHEN a user signs out of Okta portal
AND navigates to Diamond Okta login page
custom_expected:
THEN no valid sessions should be found
AND the user will need to login again
